official_title: A bill to designate September 17, 1987, the bicentennial of the signing of the Constitution of the United States, as "Constitution Day", and to make such day a legal public holiday.

summary.text: Designates September 17, 1987, as Constitution Day. Requires such day to be treated as a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A bill to designate September 17, 1987, the bicentennial of the signing of the Constitution of the United States, as "Constitution Day", and to make such day a legal public holiday.
